divs: Sighting DetailsOne night me and my sister were looking at the wolfman moon when all of a sudden a bright orange circle looking unknown object appeared out of nowhere.I tried to focus my telescope on it but the object was moving to fast for me to get it in the sight of my telescope. I watched it for about one minute then it disappeared. Me and my sister were both stunned at what we had just seen.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Clarion
There were no other sightings in Clarion on or around January 1st 2010
Summary: Bright orange, moving at a decently fast pace.
